review: Started out in my living room & moved it to my child's room ... Meets all expectations advertised!! Thank you !!
author: Vyperrhd

review: I'm a little disappointed by the fire stick. Seems like it wants to fight against an internet connection the thing just loses signal at the worst possible time.Also the apps are leaving something to be desired.
author: Hal o 3

review: It works and I like the remote. I was using streaming cords before and this is nice and easy.
author: jojo

review: So far do good, I have had no problems with it it works as advertised.
author: jason young

review: Easy setup. I like it better than my chromecast. It plays Plex perfectly unlike the chromecast. It would be great if it had more apps but over all a great value
author: Outer Banks

review: I'm not sure if it is the product or our internet strength but we can't get it to work properly.
author: traci nichols

review: Best product out there! Got ride of cable and put on in every room of my house!
author: Krystal K.

review: It is easy and quick to install. Love the ease of use and the selection of free videos, music and movies available  with prime
author: paula snickles

review: I am very pleased with the fire stick! Prime is on here along with games so I don't always have to Always charge my kindle fire (which I burn out from reading). It has great quality and sound almost like watching regular cable. I would highly recommend it to others.
author: Keneesha Massey
